subject: p19404187
History: Evaluation of the patient after bronchoscopic biopsy, assess for pneumothorax.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was compared to chest CT from. The left upper lobe opacity has substantially increased in size as compared to prior chest CT most likely reflecting bronchoscopy hemorrhage 25 cm craniocaudal dimension to 35 cm in the craniocaudal dimension. There is new left retrocardiac opacity that might reflect small area of atelectasis/aspiration. The rest of the lungs are clear. There is no appreciable pleural effusion and there is no pneumothorax.
